section.heading: Date merger or consolidation completed.
section.text: The merger or consolidation shall be complete when the Mayor issues under § 31-4451(c)(3)(C) the certificate of merger or consolidation to the new or surviving company.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 14, 1985, D.C. Law 5-160, § 3(c), 32 DCR 39

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Insurance, merger or consolidation of life companies, new company governed by a foreign jurisdiction, compliance with this chapter, see § 31-4446.
